sets.detail:
200 Melee Attack maximizes damage output 
 200 HP maximizes general bulk, but it also makes a Spectral Burst from Very Smart Revenine a 2HKO 
 44 Energy allows for 2 Counter Stances, 2 Parasitizes and either 2 Fire slams or 2 Bulk Ups 
 56 with Sluggish Speed creeps 32 Speed Sluggish Charonyx and anything slower
sets.author: Saur
